definition[0]: to make something flat or flatter, or to become flat or flatter
example[0]: Use a rolling pin to flatten the dough.
example[1]: The land flattened out as we neared the coast.
definition[1]: to destroy a building or town by knocking it down, bombing it etc
example[2]: Hundreds of homes were flattened by the tornado.
definition[2]: to defeat someone completely and easily in a game, argument etc
